docs.snippet: The Canadian dollar weakened on the New York foreign exchange market yesterday, falling below the level it reached after the Bank of Canada increased its lending rate.

docs.snippet: ASUNCION, Paraguay, Aug. 15 (Reuters)--A 21-gun salute was fired here today when Gen. Alfredo Stroessner, who has been called South America's "last dictator," was sworn in for his third term as President of Paraguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: ASUNCION, Paraguay, Aug. 15 (Reuters)--A 21-gun salute was fired here today when Gen. Alfredo Stroessner, who has been called South America's "last dictator," was sworn in for his third term as President of Paraguay.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO. MANY Brazilians have an uneasy  sensation that their nation is skirting an abyss. The feeling is reflected in two sayings that are current here: "Don't look down!" and "Don't worry. Brazil is too big for the abyss."
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO. MANY Brazilians have an uneasy sensation that their nation is skirting an abyss. The feeling is reflected in two sayings that are current here: "Don't look down!" and "Don't worry. Brazil is too big for the abyss."

headline.main: Brazil's Goulart Skirts the Abyss; The biggest country in South America has problems of a size to match. Her approach to them is being determined by a controversial President whose countrymen call him Jango. Brazil's Goulart Skirts the Abyss

docs.snippet: LIMA, Peru, Aug. 17--At Punta del Este, Uruguay, where the Alliance for Progress charter was signed two years ago at a special inter-American conference, the representatives of the United States and Cuba, Douglas Dillon and Ernesto Guevara, peered...
docs.lead_paragraph: LIMA, Peru, Aug. 17--At Punta del Este, Uruguay, where the Alliance for Progress charter was signed two years ago at a special inter-American conference, the representatives of the United States and Cuba, Douglas Dillon and Ernesto Guevara, peered into the future.
